trends: There have been 53 other sightings in Rochester

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details1.I was outside my house taking the garbage to the street.2.I was looking at howclear the sky was. 3.I thought it was a shooting star, and looked in the sky tosee if there were others or where that one came from.4.As I looked I noticed arepeat of what I just saw, about 1,000 feet distance Northeast of the first one,moving in the same direction.5. Within seconds I saw the same thing again aboutanother 1,000 feet from the second one, moving in the same direction. 6.It wentbehind the trees, and I couldnt see it after that.In summery I saw three quickflashes of light, moving in the same direction in less then two seconds time.The distance covered in the period of observation was much greater then any manmade object could achieve in that period of time.
Summary: I saw 3 quick flashes of light move quickly across
